info.title: TimeBack API - Open Badges v3.0, OneRoster v1.2, QTI v3.0 & CASE v1.1
info.description: TimeBack API built with Hono, SST, and PostgreSQL. Includes complete implementations of Open Badges v3.0 (with Verifiable Credentials), OneRoster v1.2 (Rostering, Gradebook, and Resources services), QTI v3.0 (Assessment Items), and CASE v1.1 (Competency and Academic Standards Exchange).

bearerAuth.description: JWT authorization token obtained from AWS Cognito

get.description: Get information about the authenticated user
Get information about authentication configuration and instructions

post.description: Authenticate with AWS Cognito using email and password
Clear authentication cookies and optionally revoke all SSO sessions
Register a new SSO session after successful login
Check if a valid SSO session exists for the device fingerprint

delete.description: Revoke all SSO sessions for the current user (logout everywhere)

get.description: Get all active SSO sessions for the current user
Get a list of users. Regular users only see themselves, admins see all users.

post.description: Create a new user

get.description: Get a user by ID. Users can only access their own data unless they are admin/superadmin.

post.description: Associate a system user with a OneRoster user by updating the onerosterId field

plainKey.description: The actual API key - store this securely, it won't be shown again

post.description: Create a new API key. Admin only. The plain key is returned only once.

get.description: List all API keys. Admin only.

delete.description: Revoke an API key by setting it as inactive. Admin only.

get.description: Get a paginated list of audit logs. Requires admin or superadmin role.
Get statistics about API usage. Requires admin or superadmin role.

get.description: Returns a collection of organization objects. Organizations include schools, districts, and other hierarchical entities.

Returns all students enrolled in a specific school

Returns a collection of class objects. A class is an instance of a course.

get.description: Provides public metadata about the CLR service, including its capabilities and OAuth endpoint locations

post.description: Create a new VerifiableCredential or update an existing one. Requires readwrite scope.

X-Total-Count.description: Total number of credentials for the user

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of credentials to return (1-100, default: 25)

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of credentials for the authenticated user. Requires readonly or readwrite scope.

parameters.name: credentialId
parameters.description: The IRI of the credential to retrieve

get.description: Retrieve a specific credential by ID. Requires readonly or readwrite scope.

parameters.name: credentialId
parameters.description: The IRI of the credential to delete

get.description: Retrieve the profile of the authenticated user. Requires readonly or readwrite scope.

put.description: Create a new profile or completely replace an existing profile for the authenticated user. Requires readwrite scope.
